People lack knowledge and awareness of cyber security.
Dishonest people don't follow rules.
People find convenient alternatives to cyber security requirements.
It's too difficult, or impossible, to follow the rules.
The rules do not align with personal values.

People prefer to do what they are used to doing.
People feel frustrated with cyber security requirements.
